Container.Name: binhex-webstorm
Container.Overview: Get straight to coding without having to install and configure lots of plugins. WebStorm includes everything you need for JavaScript and TypeScript development right from the start. You can personalize it further with various plugins and settings.
Container.DonateText: If you appreciate my work, then please consider buying me a beer :D

Config.Name: Port: VNC Interface
Config.Description: Specify the port used for VNC client connectivity.

Config.Name: Port: Web Interface
Config.Description: Specify the Web UI port for for the application.

Config.Name: Path: /config
Config.Description: Specify the container path to your configuration files, e.g. databases, configuration files, logs etc.

Config.Name: Path: /data
Config.Description: Specify the container path to your downloaded files or user created content.

Config.Name: Variable: HTTPS_CERT_PATH
Config.Description: Specify the path to the HTTPS certificate file

Config.Name: Variable: HTTPS_KEY_PATH
Config.Description: Specify the path to the HTTPS key file

Config.Name: Variable: WEBPAGE_TITLE
Config.Description: Specify the web title shown for the webpage

Config.Name: Variable: VNC_PASSWORD
Config.Description: Specify the password to access the Web UI, if blank no password will be prompted.

Config.Name: Variable: ENABLE_STARTUP_SCRIPTS
Config.Description: Specify whether to run a startup script which can in turn install additional packages.

Config.Name: Variable: WEBUI_PORT
Config.Description: Specify the port the application will listen on - IMPORTANT: If you change this value then you will also need to delete and re-create the port mapping to match.

Config.Name: Variable: HEALTHCHECK_COMMAND
Config.Description: The command to execute in the healthcheck script, if not specified this will be DNS and HTTPS checks against google.com.

Config.Name: Variable: HEALTHCHECK_ACTION
Config.Description: The action to execute in the healthcheck script, if not specified this will be 'exit 1', if you want the container to exit on failure then set this to 'kill 1'.

Config.Name: Variable: PUID
Config.Description: User ID for the running container

Config.Name: Variable: PGID
Config.Description: Group ID for the running container
